---
title: "Rahapodi jaksonumero"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(rvest)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
```

```{r scrape, echo=FALSE}
link = "https://www.nordnet.fi/blogi/rahapodi/"
page = read_html(link)

title = page %>%
  html_nodes(".h5 a") %>%
  html_text()

last_title = title[1]
last_episode_number = as.integer(str_sub(last_title, start = -3))

this_episode_number = last_episode_number + 1

print(paste0("Hei Martin ja Miikka! Viime jaksonne numero oli ",
            last_episode_number,
            ". Nyt teette jaksoa numero ",
            this_episode_number))
print(paste0("Viime jaksonne otsikko on '", str_sub(last_title, end = -17), "'."))
```
